activities.title: Collaborative Creature Drawing
activities.description: Take turns drawing different parts of a funny creature together - you draw the head, your child adds the body, and someone else creates the legs! Watch as a whimsical creature comes to life on paper.
activities.benefits: Develops creativity, turn-taking skills, and understanding of body concepts
activities.prep: Gather paper and non-toxic pencils/crayons. Clear a flat drawing surface. Supervise to prevent accidental ingestion of art supplies.

activities.title: Sticker Sorting Adventure
activities.description: Provide your child with colorful stickers and paper to create themed scenes - sort by color, shape, or size while building fine motor skills!
activities.benefits: Enhances categorization skills and finger dexterity
activities.prep: Collect large stickers (minimum 2 inches) and paper. Optional: Draw sorting areas on paper. Supervise to prevent stickers from being put in mouth.

activities.title: Indoor Obstacle Challenge
activities.description: Create a safe obstacle course using cushions and blankets - crawl under 'bridges', jump over 'rivers', and balance on 'mountains'!
activities.benefits: Builds gross motor skills and spatial awareness
activities.prep: Clear space and gather soft household items. Avoid unstable furniture. Place cushions away from hard edges. Supervise climbing activities closely.

activities.title: Tape Shape Games
activities.description: Create colorful shapes with tape on the floor - hop between squares, balance on lines, and jump into triangles!
activities.benefits: Teaches shape recognition and balance skills
activities.prep: Use painter's tape (not electrical) to create shapes on non-carpeted floor. Ensure jumping areas are clear of furniture corners.

activities.title: Tower Triumph Challenge
activities.description: Race to build the tallest possible tower before it tumbles - experiment with different block arrangements for maximum height!
activities.benefits: Develops engineering thinking and fine motor control
activities.prep: Provide blocks on clear floor space. Ensure blocks are large enough to prevent choking (minimum 1.5 inch diameter).

activities.title: Musical Freeze Party
activities.description: Dance wildly when music plays, then freeze in funny poses when it stops - the sillier the better!
activities.benefits: Improves listening skills and body control
activities.prep: Choose upbeat songs and clear dancing space. Remove sharp-cornered furniture. Ensure non-slip flooring.

activities.title: Color Hunt Ball Toss
activities.description: Call out a color, then throw/kick the ball to find something matching - 'Throw to something red!'
activities.benefits: Reinforces color recognition and coordination
activities.prep: Find open space with various colored objects. Choose soft ball. Avoid areas near roads or water hazards.

activities.title: Nature Treasure Hunt
activities.description: Search for outdoor wonders like smooth stones, fuzzy seeds, and patterned leaves - collect nature's artwork!
activities.benefits: Encourages observation skills and appreciation of nature
activities.prep: Prepare simple list of natural items to find. Avoid poisonous plants. Supervise closely near water or roads.

activities.title: Sock Toss Challenge
activities.description: Roll socks into balls and aim for targets like laundry baskets or boxes - score points for different targets!
activities.benefits: Develops hand-eye coordination
activities.prep: Roll 5-10 pairs of socks into balls. Ensure throwing area is clear of breakables.

activities.title: Magical Shadow Theater
activities.description: Create animal shapes with hands using a lamp - make bunnies, birds, and monsters that dance on the walls!
activities.benefits: Stimulates imagination and storytelling abilities
activities.prep: Darken room and position lamp facing blank wall. Use LED lamp (no heat). Secure cords away from walking paths.

activities.title: Sock Matching Mission
activities.description: Mix clean socks into a colorful pile and race to find perfect pairs - folding optional!
activities.benefits: Builds visual discrimination and sorting skills
activities.prep: Gather clean socks from laundry. Avoid socks with small decorative pieces that could detach.

activities.title: Wild Animal Movement Game
activities.description: 'Waddle like a penguin!' 'Jump like a kangaroo!' 'Swing like a monkey!' - imitate animal actions together!
activities.benefits: Develops gross motor skills and creativity
activities.prep: Clear space for movement. Remove sharp objects. Ensure non-slip flooring.

activities.title: Pillow Path Adventure
activities.description: Create stepping stones across the 'lava floor' using couch cushions - don't fall in!
activities.benefits: Improves balance and coordination
activities.prep: Arrange pillows in path formation. Place on carpeted surface. Supervise balance activities.

activities.title: Rainbow Scavenger Hunt
activities.description: Search for colorful treasures around the house - find something red, something blue, and something sparkly!
activities.benefits: Teaches color recognition and observation skills
activities.prep: Prepare color list or swatches. Secure unsafe items (cleaning supplies, sharp objects) before hunt.

activities.title: Imagination Voyage
activities.description: Turn a laundry basket into a spaceship/boat/race car - add cushions for seats and colander for a helmet!
activities.benefits: Encourages pretend play and creativity
activities.prep: Place empty laundry basket in open area. Ensure basket has no sharp edges. Supervise if climbing inside.

activities.title: Memory Tray Challenge
activities.description: Study 5 interesting objects on a tray, then cover and recall - who remembers the blue button?
activities.benefits: Strengthens memory and focus
activities.prep: Gather small household objects and cover. Choose items larger than 1.5 inches to prevent choking. Avoid sharp objects.

activities.title: Cozy Blanket Fort
activities.description: Drape blankets over furniture to create secret hideouts - add pillows for maximum comfort!
activities.benefits: Encourages imaginative play and spatial skills
activities.prep: Gather blankets, clips, and pillows. Ensure stable structure. Avoid heavy objects. Check for ventilation.

activities.title: Simon Says Adventure
activities.description: 'Simon says touch your toes!' 'Simon says hop like a frog!' Classic listening game with silly twists!
activities.benefits: Improves listening skills and body awareness
activities.prep: Prepare simple commands for this age. Clear movement space. Avoid commands that could cause falls.

activities.title: Toy Car Wash Station
activities.description: Set up a washing station with soapy water and sponges - give toy vehicles a bubbly bath!
activities.benefits: Develops pretend play and practical life skills
activities.prep: Prepare shallow tub with tear-free soapy water and towels. Use minimal water depth (under 2 inches). Supervise water play.

activities.title: Alphabet Discovery Hunt
activities.description: 'Find something starting with B!' - search for objects matching letter sounds
activities.benefits: Builds letter recognition and phonics awareness
activities.prep: Optional: Prepare alphabet cards. Secure unsafe areas before hunt.

activities.title: Spoon Balance Relay
activities.description: Carefully carry small objects on spoons across a course - race without dropping your 'egg'!
activities.benefits: Develops balance and concentration
activities.prep: Set start/finish lines and gather small objects. Use objects larger than 1.5 inches to prevent choking. Supervise running.

activities.title: Memory Detective
activities.description: Study objects together, close eyes, then identify which item vanished - increase difficulty with more items!
activities.benefits: Strengthens visual memory and focus
activities.prep: Gather 5-7 small household objects. Choose items larger than 1.5 inches to prevent choking. Avoid sharp objects.

activities.title: Pillowcase Carpet Slide
activities.description: Sit on pillowcases and scoot across carpet - race to the finish line!
activities.benefits: Develops core strength and coordination
activities.prep: Ensure smooth carpeted surface and clear obstacles. Avoid hardwood/tile floors. Supervise racing.

activities.title: Emotion Charades Express
activities.description: Act out happy, sad, excited or surprised faces - guess each other's feelings!
activities.benefits: Teaches emotional recognition and expression
activities.prep: Optional: Prepare emotion cards. Ensure safe space for dramatic play.

activities.title: Toy Parade Spectacular
activities.description: Line up stuffed animals and vehicles for a marching parade - add music for extra fun!
activities.benefits: Encourages imaginative play and sequencing
activities.prep: Gather favorite toys and create 'parade route'. Clear tripping hazards from path.

activities.title: Story Dice Adventure
activities.description: Roll picture dice and create collaborative tales - 'Once there was a rocket visiting a rainbow...'
activities.benefits: Develops narrative skills and creativity
activities.prep: Prepare story dice or picture cards. Ensure dice are large enough to prevent choking.

activities.title: Sock Basketball Bonanza
activities.description: Toss rolled socks into baskets from different distances - create scoring zones for extra challenge!
activities.benefits: Improves throwing accuracy and coordination
activities.prep: Roll socks into balls and place baskets/buckets. Ensure throwing area is clear of breakables.

activities.title: Follow-the-Leader Safari
activities.description: Take turns leading silly movements - 'Waddle like penguins!' 'Fly like eagles!'
activities.benefits: Develops imitation skills and creativity
activities.prep: Clear movement space. Remove tripping hazards. Avoid movements that could strain joints.

activities.title: Nature Collector Bracelet
activities.description: Make sticky bracelets to collect outdoor treasures - petals, leaves, and tiny pinecones!
activities.benefits: Encourages nature observation and fine motor skills
activities.prep: Wrap tape sticky-side out around wrists. Avoid poisonous plants. Check for insect nests before collecting.

activities.title: Playdough Restaurant
activities.description: Shape colorful playdough into pretend meals - serve 'pizza', 'cookies', and 'spaghetti' to stuffed animal customers!
activities.benefits: Develops fine motor skills and imaginative play
activities.prep: Set up non-toxic playdough and plastic kitchen tools. Supervise to prevent ingestion.

activities.title: Water Painting Magic
activities.description: 'Paint' sidewalks or fences with brushes and water - watch creations disappear in the sun!
activities.benefits: Develops creativity without mess
activities.prep: Fill containers with water and gather brushes. Supervise near roads. Use only clean water.

activities.title: Tweezer Transfer Challenge
activities.description: Move small objects between containers using tongs/chopsticks - race against the clock!
activities.benefits: Strengthens fine motor skills and focus
activities.prep: Set up bowls and small objects (cotton balls, pompoms). Use objects larger than 1.5 inches. Supervise for choking hazards.

activities.title: Shadow Tracing Adventure
activities.description: Trace each other's shadows with chalk at different times - watch how they change!
activities.benefits: Teaches sun movement concepts and body awareness
activities.prep: Gather non-toxic sidewalk chalk and find sunny area. Apply sunscreen. Provide sun hats.

activities.title: Animal Yoga Safari
activities.description: Pose like animals - crouch like frogs, stretch like cats, and stand tall like giraffes!
activities.benefits: Improves flexibility and body awareness
activities.prep: Clear space and demonstrate poses. Avoid overstretching. Use yoga mat for stability.

activities.title: Puddle Jumping Festival
activities.description: Find safe puddles after rain - measure splashes, float leaves, and jump with both feet!
activities.benefits: Develops gross motor skills and sensory exploration
activities.prep: Dress in rain boots and waterproof clothes. Avoid deep/contaminated water. Supervise near roads.

activities.title: Sock Skating Rink
activities.description: Slide across smooth floors in socks - practice spins, glides, and long slides!
activities.benefits: Improves balance and coordination
activities.prep: Ensure smooth floor surface and clear obstacles. Remove area rugs. Avoid tile/hardwood without supervision.

activities.title: Animal Sound Bingo
activities.description: Match animal pictures to their sounds - 'Moo!' for cow, 'Roar!' for lion
activities.benefits: Builds auditory discrimination and animal knowledge
activities.prep: Prepare bingo cards with animal pictures. Ensure cards have no small detachable parts.

activities.title: Dandelion Wish Magic
activities.description: Blow dandelion seeds while making wishes - count how many puffs to clear a flower!
activities.benefits: Develops oral motor skills and nature appreciation
activities.prep: Find dandelions gone to seed. Ensure no pesticides used. Avoid areas with bees.

activities.title: Pillow Balance Path
activities.description: Create challenging paths with cushions - walk tip-toe, crawl, or jump between islands!
activities.benefits: Improves balance and spatial awareness
activities.prep: Arrange pillows and cushions on floor. Place on carpeted surface. Supervise balance activities.

activities.title: Silly Moves Follow-the-Leader
activities.description: Take turns leading creative movements - 'Walk like a crab!' 'Twirl like a tornado!'
activities.benefits: Encourages creativity and imitation skills
activities.prep: Clear movement space. Remove sharp objects. Avoid movements that could cause falls.

activities.title: Mud Pie Kitchen
activities.description: Create nature 'meals' using dirt, water, and found objects - stir with sticks, serve on leaf plates!
activities.benefits: Encourages sensory play and creativity
activities.prep: Provide old kitchen tools and designate mud area. Ensure no broken tools. Wash hands thoroughly after play.

activities.title: Stuffed Animal School
activities.description: Teach favorite toys letters, numbers, or songs - be the teacher!
activities.benefits: Reinforces academic concepts through teaching
activities.prep: Set up stuffed animals as 'students'. Ensure toys have no small detachable parts.

activities.title: Q-tip Pointillism Art
activities.description: Create dot paintings using cotton swabs - make pictures with thousands of colorful dots!
activities.benefits: Develops fine motor control and creativity
activities.prep: Prepare non-toxic paint, paper, and cotton swabs. Supervise to prevent ingestion.

activities.title: Spray Bottle Art
activities.description: Create water designs on sidewalks using spray bottles - watch art evaporate in sunlight!
activities.benefits: Develops hand strength and creativity
activities.prep: Fill spray bottles with water. Supervise nozzle use. Avoid spraying people/faces.

activities.title: Color Mixing Magic
activities.description: Blend food coloring in water to create new colors - predict what purple + yellow makes!
activities.benefits: Teaches color theory and science concepts
activities.prep: Prepare clear containers, water, and food coloring. Use minimal coloring. Supervise closely - stains skin/fabric.

activities.title: Flashlight Tag Adventure
activities.description: Chase light beams in a darkened room - tag walls and ceilings with light spots!
activities.benefits: Develops coordination and spatial awareness
activities.prep: Darken room and provide flashlights. Ensure clear paths. Supervise running in dim light.

activities.title: Flower Petal Potion
activities.description: Mix petals, grass, and water in containers - create magical 'soups' and 'perfumes'!
activities.benefits: Encourages sensory exploration and creativity
activities.prep: Provide containers and stirring sticks. Avoid toxic plants. Supervise to prevent ingestion.

activities.title: Sensory Shaving Cream Canvas
activities.description: Finger-paint with colored shaving cream on a waterproof surface - mix colors and trace letters with hands!
activities.benefits: Develops sensory processing and pre-writing skills
activities.prep: Cover surface with plastic. Mix non-toxic shaving cream with food coloring in bowls. Avoid eyes/mouth. Have wet cloths ready.

activities.title: Balance Beam Challenge
activities.description: Walk along a taped line or low beam while balancing a beanbag - try different positions like tiptoe or backward!
activities.benefits: Improves balance and concentration
activities.prep: Create straight/zigzag lines with tape on non-slip surface. Supervise balancing activities.

activities.title: Magnet Fishing Expedition
activities.description: Use magnetic wands to 'fish' for paperclip treasures in a sensory bin filled with rice or beans!
activities.benefits: Teaches scientific concepts and coordination
activities.prep: Hide paperclips in sensory bin filler. Use large paperclips (bent open if needed). Supervise for choking hazards.

activities.title: Cloud Dough Construction
activities.description: Mold and shape homemade cloud dough (flour + oil) into castles and creatures using cookie cutters!
activities.benefits: Develops sensory exploration and fine motor skills
activities.prep: Mix 8 cups flour with 1 cup baby oil. Supervise to prevent inhalation of flour dust.

activities.title: Sound Scavenger Safari
activities.description: Identify and collect household items that make specific sounds - crinkly, jingly, or echoing objects!
activities.benefits: Develops auditory discrimination and classification
activities.prep: Prepare sound category cards. Secure unsafe areas before hunt.

activities.title: Bubble Wrap Stomp Dance
activities.description: Tape bubble wrap to the floor and dance to create satisfying pops - great for releasing energy!
activities.benefits: Provides sensory feedback and gross motor practice
activities.prep: Secure bubble wrap to non-carpeted floor. Supervise to prevent ingestion of popped wrap. Remove socks for better traction.

activities.title: Seed Mosaic Art
activities.description: Create patterns and pictures using different seeds and grains glued onto cardboard - explore textures and shapes!
activities.benefits: Develops fine motor control and pattern recognition
activities.prep: Draw simple shapes on cardboard. Pour seeds into trays. Use large seeds (beans, pumpkin). Supervise for choking hazards.

activities.title: Rainbow Reflection Hunt
activities.description: Use old CDs to catch sunlight and project rainbows around the room - chase and name the colors!
activities.benefits: Teaches light properties and color identification
activities.prep: Find sunny spot or dark room with flashlight. Cover sharp CD edges with tape. Supervise handling of discs.

activities.title: Alphabet Island Hop
activities.description: Jump between paper 'islands' labeled with letters - call out sounds or words starting with each letter!
activities.benefits: Reinforces letter recognition and phonics
activities.prep: Write letters on paper sheets and arrange in path. Secure papers with tape. Supervise jumping activities.

activities.title: Floating Boat Challenge
activities.description: Design boats from foil/corks and test buoyancy in water - see how many coins they can hold before sinking!
activities.benefits: Teaches engineering concepts and scientific method
activities.prep: Fill tub with water. Use large coins. Supervise water play. Empty tub immediately after activity.

activities.title: Sensory Texture Walk
activities.description: Create a barefoot path with different textures - soft towels, bumpy bubble wrap, smooth foil, and fuzzy fabric. Explore how each feels underfoot!
activities.benefits: Develops sensory awareness and descriptive vocabulary
activities.prep: Secure materials to floor with tape. Ensure no sharp edges. Supervise for balance.

activities.title: Balloon Tennis
activities.description: Use paper plate paddles to keep balloons airborne. Score points for consecutive hits without touching the ground!
activities.benefits: Improves hand-eye coordination and tracking skills
activities.prep: Tape craft sticks to plates as handles. Inflate balloons. Supervise to prevent balloon bursting near face.

activities.title: Nature Rubbing Art
activities.description: Place leaves, coins, or textured objects under paper and rub with crayons to reveal hidden patterns and shapes.
activities.benefits: Develops observation skills and fine motor control
activities.prep: Collect flat textured items. Secure paper with tape. Avoid poisonous plants.

activities.title: Giant Number Hunt
activities.description: Hide large numbered cards around play area. Find and arrange in order - jump on each number as you sequence them!
activities.benefits: Reinforces number recognition and sequencing
activities.prep: Create number cards 1-10. Partially hide around room. Secure unsafe areas first.

activities.title: Pasta Jewelry Creations
activities.description: String dyed pasta onto yarn to create colorful necklaces and bracelets. Sort by color or pattern!
activities.benefits: Develops fine motor skills and patterning
activities.prep: Dye pasta with food coloring+vinegar, dry overnight. Tape yarn ends. Supervise for choking hazards.

activities.title: Mirror Movement Game
activities.description: Face your child and copy each other's movements exactly - become living mirrors! Switch leader roles frequently.
activities.benefits: Develops observation skills and body awareness
activities.prep: Clear space facing each other. Remove tripping hazards.

activities.title: Rainbow Bubble Foam
activities.description: Whip up colorful foam using water, soap, and food coloring. Scoop, pour, and explore this sensory wonderland!
activities.benefits: Encourages sensory exploration and scientific curiosity
activities.prep: Whip 1 cup water + Â¼ cup tear-free soap until foamy. Add coloring. Supervise water play. Rinse skin after.

activities.title: Shape Detective
activities.description: Use paper tube 'magnifying glasses' to hunt for circles, squares, and triangles in everyday objects around the house.
activities.benefits: Reinforces shape recognition in real-world contexts
activities.prep: Decorate paper tubes as spyglasses. Prepare shape references. Secure unsafe areas first.

activities.title: Magic Painting Reveal
activities.description: Paint over white crayon drawings with watercolors to reveal hidden pictures and messages!
activities.benefits: Teaches cause-and-effect relationships and color blending
activities.prep: Draw secret designs with white crayon beforehand. Use non-toxic watercolors. Supervise painting.

activities.title: Indoor Mini-Golf
activities.description: Create a putting course using cups and cardboard ramps. Practice gentle swings with a plastic club!
activities.benefits: Develops hand-eye coordination and force modulation
activities.prep: Set up obstacles and targets on carpet. Ensure swinging space is clear of people/breakables.

activities.title: Weather Station
activities.description: Observe weather changes with homemade tools: windsock, rain gauge, and cloud chart!
activities.benefits: Teaches scientific observation and weather patterns
activities.prep: Create simple instruments together first. Supervise outdoor observation. Apply sunscreen.

activities.title: Texture Scavenger Hunt
activities.description: Find objects matching different textures: bumpy, smooth, fuzzy, and scratchy!
activities.benefits: Develops sensory awareness and descriptive vocabulary
activities.prep: Prepare tactile sample cards. Secure unsafe items before hunt.

activities.title: Musical Shakers
activities.description: Fill containers with different materials to create unique sounds. Experiment with rhythm patterns!
activities.benefits: Teaches sound properties and rhythm recognition
activities.prep: Seal containers securely with tape. Use large containers impossible to open. Supervise shaking.

activities.title: Giant Dot-to-Dot
activities.description: Create floor-sized connect-the-dots with chalk or tape. Connect numbers while moving your whole body!
activities.benefits: Reinforces number sequence and gross motor skills
activities.prep: Prepare large surface with numbered points. Secure walking path. Supervise movement between dots.

activities.title: Pillowcase Relay
activities.description: Hop inside pillowcases and race across the room! Team version: Pass the pillowcase like a baton.
activities.benefits: Develops balance and cooperative play
activities.prep: Clear space and mark start/finish lines. Ensure non-slip flooring. Supervise hopping.

activities.title: Nature Faces
activities.description: Create funny faces using found natural materials: leaves for hair, stones for eyes, twigs for mouths!
activities.benefits: Encourages creativity and pattern recognition
activities.prep: Collect safe natural materials. Avoid poisonous plants. Wash hands after handling.

activities.title: Letter Jump
activities.description: Jump from letter to letter while practicing phonics - 'Jump to the letter that says /m/'!
activities.benefits: Reinforces letter-sound recognition
activities.prep: Write large letters on paper and arrange on floor. Secure papers with tape. Supervise jumping.

activities.title: Shadow Puppet Theater
activities.description: Cut simple shapes to create animal puppets that tell stories on a backlit sheet!
activities.benefits: Develops storytelling and fine motor skills
activities.prep: Cut simple animal shapes beforehand. Supervise scissor use. Use LED flashlight (no heat).

activities.title: Sensory Writing Tray
activities.description: Practice letter formation in salt or rice trays using fingers or sticks!
activities.benefits: Builds pre-writing skills through sensory input
activities.prep: Fill tray with thin layer of material. Use coarse salt or large-grain rice. Supervise to prevent inhalation.

activities.title: Balloon Volleyball
activities.description: Use a string 'net' to volley balloons back and forth. Keep it airborne as long as possible!
activities.benefits: Develops tracking skills and cooperation
activities.prep: String yarn between chairs at child-height. Ensure clear playing space. Supervise to prevent balloon bursting near face.

activities.title: Colorful Ice Excavation
activities.description: Freeze colored water with small toys inside. Use safe tools to melt and discover treasures!
activities.benefits: Teaches scientific concepts and patience
activities.prep: Freeze colored water with small objects overnight. Use objects larger than 1.5 inches. Supervise tool use.

activities.title: Cardboard Box Town
activities.description: Transform boxes into buildings, vehicles, and play structures. Decorate with crayons and stickers!
activities.benefits: Encourages imaginative play and engineering
activities.prep: Collect various sized boxes. Remove staples/tape residue. Supervise cutting activities.

activities.title: Balance Icebergs
activities.description: Step between paper 'icebergs' without falling in the 'ocean'. Remove icebergs to increase challenge!
activities.benefits: Develops balance and problem-solving
activities.prep: Arrange plates in path across floor. Secure with tape. Supervise balancing activities.

activities.title: Sound Matching Game
activities.description: Match identical sounds in sealed containers. Find pairs with the same rattle!
activities.benefits: Develops auditory discrimination and memory
activities.prep: Prepare matching sound pairs in containers. Seal containers permanently. Use fillers larger than choking hazard size.

activities.title: Bubble Wrap Road
activities.description: Unroll bubble wrap for toy cars to drive on. Enjoy the sensory crunch and pop!
activities.benefits: Provides tactile feedback and imaginative play
activities.prep: Secure bubble wrap to floor with tape. Supervise to prevent ingestion of popped wrap.

activities.title: Alphabet Soup
activities.description: Fish for floating letters in a water bin. Spell simple words with what you catch!
activities.benefits: Reinforces letter recognition and fine motor skills
activities.prep: Fill bin with shallow water and floating letters. Use large letters. Supervise water play. Empty bin immediately after.

activities.title: Emotion Stones
activities.description: Paint feeling faces on smooth stones. Use them to share emotions and tell stories!
activities.benefits: Develops emotional intelligence and creativity
activities.prep: Wash and dry stones beforehand. Use non-toxic acrylics. Seal with child-safe varnish when dry.

activities.title: Magnet Tile Mazes
activities.description: Build marble runs with magnetic tiles. Experiment with different pathways!
activities.benefits: Develops spatial reasoning and engineering skills
activities.prep: Ensure marbles are large enough to prevent choking (minimum 1.75 inch diameter). Supervise initial construction.

activities.title: Nature Weaving
activities.description: Weave leaves, grass, and flowers through a cardboard loom. Create seasonal art!
activities.benefits: Develops fine motor skills and pattern creation
activities.prep: Create simple loom by wrapping yarn around cardboard. Avoid poisonous plants. Wash hands after handling nature items.

activities.title: Animal Yoga Adventure
activities.description: Pose like animals with guided storytelling: 'Stretch like a waking bear! Balance like a flamingo!'
activities.benefits: Improves flexibility and body awareness
activities.prep: Clear space and prepare simple narrative. Avoid overstretching. Use mat for stability.

activities.title: Counting Caterpillar
activities.description: Build a numbered caterpillar with paper circles. Add segments while counting forward and backward!
activities.benefits: Reinforces number sequencing and counting
activities.prep: Prepare numbered circles 1-10. Use large circles (minimum 3 inches).

activities.title: Shadow Dance Party
activities.description: Dance in front of a light source to create giant moving shadows. Freeze in funny shapes!
activities.benefits: Develops body awareness and creativity
activities.prep: Darken room and position LED light toward blank wall. Secure cords. Clear movement space.

activities.title: Rainbow Rice Sensory Bin
activities.description: Explore colored rice with scoops and containers - bury treasures and practice pouring skills!
activities.benefits: Develops sensory processing and fine motor skills
activities.prep: Dye rice with vinegar+food coloring, dry overnight. Use large scoops. Supervise to prevent ingestion.

activities.title: Balloon Rocket Race
activities.description: Launch balloons along a string track. Experiment with different air amounts for speed!
activities.benefits: Teaches basic physics and cause-effect relationships
activities.prep: String lines across room, attach straws to balloons. Supervise balloon inflation. Avoid launching toward faces.

activities.title: Texture Matching Game
activities.description: Match mystery objects in socks to texture cards. Guess items using only touch!
activities.benefits: Develops tactile discrimination and vocabulary
activities.prep: Place safe objects in socks, create matching cards. Use objects larger than 1.5 inches. Avoid sharp items.

activities.title: Nature Paintbrushes
activities.description: Create brushes from pine needles, leaves, and grass. Paint with natural textures!
activities.benefits: Encourages creativity and nature exploration
activities.prep: Bind natural materials to sticks with rubber bands. Avoid toxic plants. Use washable paints.

activities.title: Emotion Weather Report
activities.description: Express feelings as weather: 'I feel sunny!' or 'I feel stormy' with drawings and movements
activities.benefits: Develops emotional literacy and self-awareness
activities.prep: Prepare weather emotion chart. Use non-toxic art supplies.

activities.title: Coding Critters Path
activities.description: Create simple 'programs' with arrow cards to guide toys through obstacle courses
activities.benefits: Introduces computational thinking and sequencing
activities.prep: Make directional cards (forward, left, right). Ensure obstacle course is safe.

activities.title: Bubble Wrap Stomp Painting
activities.description: Stomp on bubble wrap covered in paint to create abstract art masterpieces!
activities.benefits: Provides sensory input and creative expression
activities.prep: Tape bubble wrap paint-side down on paper. Use washable paint. Supervise stomping.

activities.title: Shadow Measurement
activities.description: Track shadows throughout the day with chalk marks. Compare morning vs. afternoon sizes!
activities.benefits: Teaches sun movement concepts and measurement
activities.prep: Choose sunny day, mark measurement times. Apply sunscreen. Provide sun hats.

activities.title: Sock Puppet Theater
activities.description: Create characters from socks and put on shows. Develop stories with beginnings and endings!
activities.benefits: Develops narrative skills and creativity
activities.prep: Prepare decorating materials, create simple stage. Supervise scissor use. Avoid small decorative items.

activities.title: Balance Bird Challenge
activities.description: Create cardboard birds that balance on fingertips. Experiment with wing shapes!
activities.benefits: Teaches balance concepts and engineering
activities.prep: Pre-cut bird shapes, add weight to beak area. Secure coins with tape. Supervise balancing.

activities.title: Musical Statues Story
activities.description: Freeze in storybook character poses when music stops. 'Be Cinderella!' 'Now be a dragon!'
activities.benefits: Develops imagination and body control
activities.prep: Prepare character suggestions. Clear movement space. Avoid poses that could cause falls.

activities.title: Seed Sprouting Lab
activities.description: Plant seeds in clear jars with damp paper towels. Observe roots and shoots developing!
activities.benefits: Teaches plant life cycles and patience
activities.prep: Choose fast-sprouting seeds like beans. Use wide-mouth jars. Supervise handling of seeds.

activities.title: Color Symphony
activities.description: Assign colors to instruments/sounds. Create 'symphonies' by following color sequence cards
activities.benefits: Develops auditory discrimination and sequencing
activities.prep: Create color-coded sound cards. Use soft-volume instruments. Provide ear protection if noisy.

activities.title: Magnetic Scavenger Hunt
activities.description: Test objects around the house with magnets. Discover what's magnetic and what's not!
activities.benefits: Introduces scientific testing and classification
activities.prep: Prepare prediction chart. Use large magnets. Keep away from electronics.

activities.title: Giant Memory Match
activities.description: Play memory game with large cards on the floor. Stretch and reach to find pairs!
activities.benefits: Strengthens memory and gross motor skills
activities.prep: Create matching pairs on large cards. Secure playing area. Supervise vigorous movement.

activities.title: Bottle Cap Patterns
activities.description: Create color patterns with recycled bottle caps. Extend sequences and create rhythms!
activities.benefits: Develops patterning and early math skills
activities.prep: Paint caps different colors. Use non-toxic paint. Supervise for choking hazards.

activities.title: Frozen Dinosaur Excavation
activities.description: Chip away at ice blocks to rescue toy dinosaurs. Use safe tools and salt solutions!
activities.benefits: Teaches scientific methods and patience
activities.prep: Freeze dinosaurs in large water blocks overnight. Use plastic tools. Supervise chipping activities. Provide gloves.

activities.title: Rainbow Walking Water
activities.description: Watch colored water 'walk' between cups through paper towels. Create new colors!
activities.benefits: Demonstrates capillary action and color mixing
activities.prep: Set up cups in circle with paper towel bridges. Use minimal food coloring. Place on waterproof surface.

activities.title: Shape Construction Site
activities.description: Use geometric blocks to 'build' structures following blueprint cards
activities.benefits: Develops spatial reasoning and shape knowledge
activities.prep: Create simple structure cards. Ensure blocks are large enough to prevent choking.

activities.title: Nature Mandalas
activities.description: Create circular patterns with flowers, leaves, and stones. Temporary outdoor art!
activities.benefits: Develops patterning and appreciation of symmetry
activities.prep: Find flat surface, collect diverse natural items. Avoid poisonous plants. Wash hands after.
